param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: senderprofile
param.label: SMS_SENDER_PROFILE
param.description: The sender profile you want, the front end module to use

param.name: sendtext
param.label: SMS_BUTTON_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed on the send button

param.name: introtext
param.label: SMS_INTRO_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed before the form inside a span class=acysms_introtext

param.name: finaltext
param.label: SMS_POST_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed after the form inside a span class=acysms_finaltext

param.name: defaultnumber
param.label: SMS_PHONE
param.description: This text will be the default phone number of your Module

param.name: defaultmessage
param.label: SMS_MESSAGE
param.description: This text will be the default message of your Module

param.name: maxNumberMessage
param.label: SMS_MESSAGE_MAX_CHARACTERS
param.description: Maximum number of characters allowed for the message

param.name: blockModification
param.label: SMS_BLOCK_MODIFICATION
param.description: Allow the users to modify the message and the phone number
